SqlResource.Insert: INSERT INTO dbo.[User] ( Id ,UserName ,MobileNO ,TrueName , CreateTime ,LastUpdateTime ,UserType ,City_Id ,NewId,State,CompanyName) VALUES (@Id,@UserName ,@MobileNO,@TrueName, GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,@UserType,@City_Id,@NewId,@State,@CompanyName)
SqlResource.Update: UPDATE dbo.[User] SET UserName =@UserName,MobileNO =@MobileNO,TrueName=@TrueName,LastUpdateTime=GETDATE() ,UserType=@UserType,City_Id=@City_Id,[State]=@State,[CompanyName]=@CompanyName WHERE Id=@Id
